text: Syed Ali Shah Geelani (29 September 1929 â€“ 1 September 2021) was an Indian Kashmiri separatist leader and politician. He was a member of the Jammu and Kashmir Legislative Assembly from 1972 until 1982 and again from 1987 until 1990. Geelani was born in Bandipore, Jammu and Kashmir. He was a member of the All Parties Hurriyat Conference. Geelani died on 1 September 2021 at a hospital in Srinagar, India from pneumonia caused by kidney cancer, aged 91. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Jammu and Kashmir
title: Syed Ali Shah Geelani
